review.comment: Showed up early, which was fantastic, and had great communication throughout. Was so impressed by the quality of cleaning at the price quoted. Our vents and dryer were disgusting, not sure if they had ever been cleaned (we are renters). Las Vegas Air Duct Cleaning came in and did a stellar job, feels like a weight has been lighted from the house. Would recommend to friends and family.
